pullRequest.title: Removed 'StateDescriptionProvider' interface
pullRequest.bodyText:
Removed StateDescriptionProvider interface
Replaced deprecated constructor of StateDescription by StateDescriptionFragmentBuilder

Related to #1408
Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp github@christophweitkamp.de

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @deprecated use {@link StateChannelTypeBuilder::withStateDescriptionFragment} instead.
          
          
            
                 * @deprecated use {@link StateChannelTypeBuilder#withStateDescriptionFragment} instead.

commit.message:
Removed 'StateDescriptionProvider' interface and replaced deprecated constructor of 'StateDescription' by 'StateDescriptionFragmentBuilder'

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>

Incorporated comments from review and replacement of deprecated 'withStateDescription()' methods

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>

Changes after rebase to latest master

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>
